text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Advertise" means:
To publish, circulate, disseminate, or place before the public in any way or through any medium for the purpose of selling merchandise; and
Advertising by:
Exterior or interior signs, including neon or other electrical signs;
Radio, telephone, or television; and
Newspaper, magazine, book, notice, or any other method or material.
"Person" includes an association, firm, partnership, corporation, or an agent or employee of any of these entities.
